T01D1158:203b-1: buddha sya ni rb'a na sto tram /
T01D1158:203b-3: sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la bstod pa /
T01D1158:203b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1158:203b-5: gang zhig ser skya'i gzhir ni sh'akya'i rigs su 'khrungs //
T01D1158:203b-6: gang gis mnyam dgar byang chub dam pa thugs su chud //
T01D1158:203b-7: gang gis w'a r'a na s'ir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T01D1158:203b-8: s'a la'i tshal du mya ngan 'das gyur de bstod pa //
T01D1158:203b-9: kyi hud snying rje ldan mgon rgyal ba'i sdig pa zhi //
T01D1158:203b-10: kyi hud sems can mnyes gshin kha los sgyur bzang
T01D1158:203b-11: mchog / kyi hud ded dpon zhi ba'i lam gyur
T01D1158:203b-12: ston pa po // kyi hud sdug dang mi sdug thugs snyoms 'jig rten gnyen //
T01D1158:203b-13: kyi hud mun nag gis bsgribs mig can 'jig rten spyan ;
T01D1158:203b-14: / kyi hud thub chen gru yis 'jig rten sgrol mdzad pa //
T01D1158:203b-15: kyi hud s'a la'i tshal du ci phyir mya ngan 'das //
T01D1158:203b-16: khyod zhal zla rgyas pad+ma kha phye 'dra ba dang //
T01D1158:203b-17: autpala rgyas pa lta bu'i spyan ldan sku nyid kyang //
T01D1158:203b-18: gser gyi ri 'dra mtshan rnams rdzogs pa sus mthong 'gyur //
T01D1158:203b-19: kyi hud 'od 'dra'i gzugs mchog 'di ma mthong bas sdug bsngal lo //
T01D1158:203b-20: sngon tshe rgya chen lam gyi rang bzhin gzings bcas te //
T01D1158:203b-21: nyid kyi don dang 'gro ba chen po'i gzhan don mdzad //
T01D1158:203b-22: srog chags brgya phrag mang po thar dang mtho ris bkod //
T01D1158:203b-23: kyi hud mi rtag me tshogs dag gis zad mthar gyur //
T01D1158:203b-24: dag pa'i rdzing yangs tshul khrims chu yis bsil bar bltams //
T01D1158:203b-25: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi chu srin dur pas khyab //
T01D1158:203b-26: dge slong dam pa gzhan tshogs brgya yis nye bar bsten //
T01D1158:203b-27: kyi hud bde 'gro'i 'bab stegs skam la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1158:203b-28: spyod pa'i rtsa ba brtan zhing dran pa'i sdong pos mdzes //
T01D1158:203b-29: byang chub yan lag me tog kha bye bzod yal
T01D1158:203b-30: ga / ngo tsha'i 'dab rgyas bdud rtsi 'bras bus
T01D1158:203b-31: mchog g-yur za // kyi hud bde gshegs shing 'gye la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1158:203b-32: rdul med mya ngan 'das pa nam mkha'i ngos legs bzhugs //
T01D1158:204a-0: @204a * // slob ma tshul khrims legs gnas dkyil 'khor skar ma can //
T01D1158:204a-1: 'phags lam skyed byed blo mig yid 'ong zla zer can //
T01D1158:204a-2: kyi hud bde gshegs zla ba nub la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1158:204a-3: gti mug mun nag sel mdzad yon tan 'od zer ldan //
T01D1158:204a-4: gdul bya'i tshogs kyi rdzing gi pad+ma kha 'byed cing //
T01D1158:204a-5: lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis dri ma'i 'dam skems mdzad //
T01D1158:204a-6: kyi hud bde gshegs nyi ma nub la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1158:204a-7: byams mchog sku mnga' 'phags pa'i bden bzhi'i zhabs dang ldan //
T01D1158:204a-8: zhi gnas lhag mthong lha yi spyan gnyis dang ldan zhing //
T01D1158:204a-9: dad pa rab skyed rnam dag grol ba'i 'gros kyis bzhud //
T01D1158:204a-10: kyi hud bde gshegs glang chen zhir gshegs bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1158:204a-11: sems can med pa sgra sgrogs mu stegs ri dags 'joms //
T01D1158:204a-12: ngo mtshar ral pa'i tshogs mnga' 'phyang bas sku la brgyan //
T01D1158:204a-13: shes rab mche ba rab rno tshul khrims dge ba'i zhabs //
T01D1158:204a-14: kyi hud bde gshegs seng ge zhir gshegs bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1158:204a-15: sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs 'das khyod la bdag bstod pas //
T01D1158:204a-16: bsod nams rgya chen 'bras bu mtha' yas gang bsags pa //
T01D1158:204a-17: des ni bdag gis gnas mchog dam pa thob gyur nas //
T01D1158:204a-18: khyed 'dra kho nar 'gro la phan pa bgyid gyur
T01D1158:204a-19: cig / sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das
T01D1158:204a-20: pa la bstod pa slob dpon chen po dpal ldan
